bibl.title: Hakoris, an Egyptian Nobleman and His Family.
bibl.note: 1. The Personal Name Hakoris [a full survey in chronological order]. - 2. The Name of the Town Hakoris. - 3. An important Egyptian Nobleman [Hakoris was at the time of the great Theban revolt strategos of the Hermopolite or Cynopolite nome]. - Conclusion.
CLARYSSE Willy, Hakoris, an Egyptian Nobleman and His Family.
